post.text: There has never been so many lies and so much deception. A special prosecutor will look into #CrookedHillary!

comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: I'm an independent don't belong to any party. My take on the debate was Trump was the clear winner and Hillary has too many damaging crimes, scandals, lies and Bill Clinton's sexual abuses of women is thousand times worst than what Trump said on the bus. Now I see why everyone calls Hillary Crooked.

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: So glad you have come to the light where you can see all the corruption lies and cheating ..... which has begun. Bins were found in a warehouse in Ohio full of fraudulent ballots for Killary,😡 Can't do anything honestly 😡👎🏻
